It's famous for educating the Royals. But Kate Middleton has her own intriguing connection with Eton College, the most prestigious school in the country
09/07/23 07:18
Eton College was always going to be a likely choice for Prince George. 
Although nothing has been announced, the nine-year-old was recently pictured visiting the ancient school. Not only did his father and uncle, Princes William and George study there , but so did George's Spencer relatives, including uncle Charles, the ninth Earl. More surprisingly, The Mail's Royal section can reveal that George's mother, Kate Middeton, has her own connections to the school - which sits in the shadow of Windsor Castle - and that two of the college's most iconic buildings bear the name of her ancestors.
